elements.label: Test Instruction
elements.description:
Key Benefits


  1. Centralized View : Provides a bird's-eye view of resource allocation across all projects.
  2. Variance Analysis : Quickly identifies areas where costs are exceeding budgets.
  3. Decision Support : Helps management reallocate resources or adjust budgets to address variances.
  4. Dynamic Updates : Automatically updates when new data is added to the Project-Level template.
